Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will make a comeback in the T20 series after a hiatus of nearly 14 months.
KL Rahul has been left out of the squad.
Hardik Pandya and Suryakumar Yadav will not be participating in the T20I series due to injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs Afghanistan T20I series will be live streamed on JioCinema app and website in India.
The series will be live telecasted on Sports 18 Network.
The series will be India's last T20I series before the forthcoming T20 World Cup 2024.
Others: The series will start from 11 January 2024 and end on 17 January 2024.

The schedule of India vs Afghanistan T20I series is as follows: 1st T20I on 11 January at Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali, 2nd T20I on 14 January at Holkar Cricket Stadium, Indore, and 3rd T20I on 17 January at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru.
